name: California
description: California, a western U.S. state, stretches from the Mexican border along the Pacific for nearly 900 miles.

name: Bali
description: Bali is an Indonesian island known for its forested volcanic mountains, iconic rice paddies, beaches and coral reefs.

name: London
description: London, the capital of England and the United Kingdom, is a 21st-century city with history stretching back to Roman times.

name: Miami
description: Miami, officially the City of Miami, is the seat of Miami-Dade County.

name: Athen
description: It is the heart of Ancient Greece, a powerful civilization and empire.

name: Saint Martin
description: Saint Martin is part of the Leeward Islands in the Caribbean Sea.
